about_the_game:
Faraway Lands: Rise of Yokai is a unique side-scrolling base-building and survival game set in mystical feudal Japan. As the newly appointed lord, grow your settlement into a stronghold and withstand relentless Yokai assaults under the cover of night. Recruit diverse immigrants with unique traits, explore uncharted territories, forge new alliances, and shape the destiny of a realm torn between light and darkness.

BUILD AND FORTIFY

Strategically utilize the unique mountainous terrain to create a visually stunning and effective town, offering a fresh twist for fans of base-building games. Each structure you build and upgrade brings new possibilities and challenges.

RESEARCH & PROGRESS

Advance your settlement with a dynamic research system driven by scholars in pagodas. Progress through tiered advancements to unlock powerful upgrades that shape your town’s future. Randomized research options keep every playthrough fresh, while focusing on specific areas lets you tailor your strategy to adapt and thrive.

MANAGE VILLAGERS WITH UNIQUE TRAITS

Each villager in your game is unique, possessing distinct traits that affect their abilities and efficiency. Skillfully assign them to various jobs – from resource gathering to crafting – to maximize your town's productivity. Balance is key – ensure your villagers are well-fed, healthy, and happy to maintain efficiency and growth. Watch your town transform from a simple settlement into a thriving community.

WITHSTAND THE YOKAI ASSAULTS

As night falls, your strategic skills are put to the test against the terrifying Yokai. Train a diverse range of soldiers, from mighty Samurai wielding deadly katana to mystical Onmyōji who can control spirits, and lead them in defending your town. Hire skilled mercenaries, bringing their unique talents to your town's defense. Strategically deploy soldiers to guard your town's perimeters. Each night is a test of your defensive tactics and resilience.

EXPLORE

Sail beyond your borders into a vast world of discovery. Chart unknown territories, encounter pirates, and unveil secret islands. Establish trade routes with new countries, enriching your base with rare resources and exotic rewards. Go beyond the surface and delve deep underground to unearth precious ores, mysterious caves, and secrets that lie beneath your town. What you find may just give you the edge you need to turn the tide against the Yokai.

CONFRONT NATURAL DISASTERS

Experience a world alive with dynamic weather and changing seasons, each bringing its own set of challenges and beauty. Brace your town against natural disasters that test your management skills. How will you adapt to the whims of nature?

CHOOSE YOUR LORD & RELICS

Customize your gameplay with an array of unique relics and lords. Each lord brings a distinct style to your town, while relics offer new gameplay dynamics. Experiment with different combinations for a fresh experience every time you play.

BEAUTIFY YOUR TOWN

Create not just a functional town, but also a breathtaking one in a rich pixel-art style. Utilize a wide array of decorations to add beauty and charm to your town. From bonsai to ornate statues, each addition makes your town more distinct and visually stunning.

name: Faraway Lands: Rise of Yokai
short_description: Faraway Lands: Rise of Yokai is an immersive base-building survival strategy game set in mystical Feudal Japan. Build and fortify your town, gather resources, explore new lands, trade with other cities and defend your town against the risen Yokai threat!
supported_languages:
English*, German, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Spanish - Spain, French, Polish
*languages with full audio support
